original_title: Queer Transnational Love in the Time of Social Media and Globalization
overview: In this theoretical study in video form, the filmmaker analyzes the possibilities and impracticability of queer, transnational love. Using found footage, he retraces the story of his love with the research subject in an effort to work through the trauma of ending a relationship.
title: Queer Transnational Love in the Time of Social Media and Globalization
